PreparerFirmBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1: MYATT BLUME AND FIDALEO LTD LLP

Name.BusinessNameLine1: SOUTH PLAINS COMMUNITY ACTION ASSOC INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: ADMIN FEDERAL AND STATE GRANTS TO PROVIDE OPPORTUNITIES AND INITIATIVES FOR INDIVIDUALS ECONOMIC GROWTH AND SELF-SUFFICIENCY.
IRS990.MissionDescription: ADMIN FEDERAL AND STATE GRANTS TO PROVIDE OPPORTUNITIES AND INITIATIVES FOR INDIVIDUALS ECONOMIC GROWTH AND SELF-SUFFICIENCY, THEREBY HELPING PEOPLE AND CHANGING LIVES. THE AGENCY VISION IS EMPOWERING COMMUNITIES THROUGH SELF-SUFFICIENCY.
IRS990.Description: CHILDHOOD DEVELOPMENT-INCLUDES A HEAD START GRANT, A GRANT FOR CHILD CARE SERVICES, AND AN EARLY LEARNING CENTER APPROXIMATELY 8,242 INDIVIDUALS RECEIVED SERVICES

Activity2.Description: HEALTH SERVICES-INCLUDES FAMILY PLANNING CLINICS, MEDICARE & MEDICAID REIMB PROGRAMS, PRIMARY HEALTH CARE CLINICS, A WIC PROGRAM, AND A SENIOR COMPANION PROGRAM. APPROXIMATELY 186,454 INDIVIDUALS RECEIVED SERVICES

Activity3.Description: PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION SERVICES-INCLUDES A RURAL PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION ASSISTANCE NETWORK THAT PROVIDES THE GENERAL PUBLIC IN OUR NON-URBANIZED AREA ACCESS TO AFFORDABLE PUBLC TRANSPORTATION. APPROXIMATELY 80,463 INDIVIDUALS SERVICED

ActivityOther.Description: THESE SERVICES INCLUDED FEDERAL GRANTS RECEIVED BY THE AGENCY TO PROVIDE ENERGY SERVICES TO LOW-INCOME INDIVIDUALS AND EDUCATION & EMPLOYMENT TRAINING THOUGH WORKFORCE INVESTMENT ACT GRANTS

Form990ScheduleIPartIII.TypeOfGrant: UTILITY ASSISTANCE AND WEATHERIZATION ASSISTANCE PAYMENTS ON THE BEHALF OF LOW INCOME INDIVIDUALS THRU GRANTS RECEIVED FROM THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF ENERGY AND U.S. DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
PAYMENTS TO PURCHASE FOOD FOR SCHOOL AGED CHILDREN FROM LOW INCOME FAMILIES THRU GRANTS RECEIVED FROM THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE
HOUSING ASSISTANCE PAYMENTS ON THE BEHALF OF LOW INCOME AIDS PATIENTS THRU GRANTS RECEIVED FROM THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
PAYMENTS FOR MEDICAL SERVICES ON THE BEHALF OF LOW INCOME INDIVIDUALS WITH FUNDS RECEIVED FROM THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
STIPENDS PAID TO INDIVIDUALS FOR THE SENIOR COMPANION GRANT AND HEADSTART PARENT ACTIVITY FUNDED BY THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
EDUCATION ASSISTANCE PAYMENTS ON THE BEHALF OF LOW INCOME INDIVIDUALS WITH FUNDS RECEIVED FROM THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF LABOR THRU THE WORKFORCE INVESTMENT ACT GRANTS

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: THE AGENCY IMPLEMENTS INTERNAL CONTROL PROCEDURES TO ENSURE THAT THESE GRANT FUNDS ARE EXPENDED IN ACCORDANCE WITH OMB CIRCULAR A-122. THE AGENCY ALSO HAS AN ANNUAL AUDIT THAT REVIEWS THESE CONTROLS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ARE REQUIRED TO SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT AND DISCLOSE OWNERSHIP IN LOCAL BUSINESSES. THE FINANCE DEPARTMENT OF THE AGENCY MONITORS THE PAYMENT OF GOODS AND SERVICES TO ENSURE THAT THE AGENCY IS NOT DOING BUSINESS WITH OFFICERS OR BOARD MEMBERS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ANNUALLY REVIEWS SALARY FOR OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES. THE BOARD COMPARES THESE SALARIES TO SIMLIAR NON-PROFITS WITHIN THE STATE TO DETERMINE THE PROPER SALARY.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 18
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE AGENCY'S FORM 990 IS MADE AVAILABLE THRU GUIDESTAR. A COPY OF THE AGENCY'S ANNUAL AUDIT REPORT IS AVAILABLE THRU THE OMB WEBSITE.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE AGENCY MAKES THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AVAILABLE AT THEIR ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICE.
